name: XP-LAN
description:
XP-LAN is a basic framework for RPG Maker XP for multiplayer over LAN (local wi-fi). Most other modules (such as RMX-OS) are focused on online multiplayer and have unnecessary scripts (like entire guild systems). This project was made for my own projects but is now open sourced for you to use if you so please.

This project is under MIT license so you can use it commercially. You just need to own a copy of RPG Maker XP (obviously).

Features:

  • View other player locations in real time.
  • Supports as many players as you like.
  • Built in chat system.
  • Easy to send data to other players (like data for a combat system).

The following open source scripts are used:

  • Eight Directional Movement: DerVVulfman
  • Lagless Path Finder: Blizzard
  • Template Events: ThallionDarkshine
